entry.def: If something such as hot oil or fat sizzles, it makes hissing sounds.

example.ex: The sausages and burgers sizzled on the barbecue.
example.tran: 香肠和牛肉饼在烤架上咝咝作响。
油烧得咝咝作响的平底锅

means.word_mean: 1. hot enough to burn with or as if with a hissing sound;
2. characterized by intense emotion or interest or excitement;

auth_sentence.content: Britain carried on sizzling yesterday as the heatwave scorched up to...90 degrees.
auth_sentence.res_content: Britain carried on sizzling yesterday as the heatwave scorched up to...90 degrees.
